mapper.insert:
select cm_seq.nextval from dual
insert into chat_message(cm_num,cr_num,m_num,cm_content,cm_type) values(#{cmNum},#{crNum},#{mNum},#{cmContent},#{cmType})
mapper.select: select a.cm_num,a.cr_num,a.m_num,a.cm_content,a.cm_write_date,a.m_name,a.cm_type,a.m_profileimg, f.f_num from (select cm.cm_num ,cm.cr_num,cm.m_num,cm.cm_content,cm.cm_write_date,m.m_name,cm.cm_type,m.m_profileimg from chat_message cm, member m where cm.m_num=m.m_num and cm.cr_num=#{param1}) a left outer join favorite f on f.cm_num = a.cm_num and f.m_num=#{param2} order by a.cm_write_date asc

select * from ( select rownum as rnum,m_name,cm_num,cr_num,m_num,cm_content,cm_write_date,cm_type from ( select * from (select cm.cm_num,m.m_name,cm.cr_num,cm.m_num,cm.cm_content,cm.cm_write_date,cm.cm_type from chat_message cm, member m where cm.m_num=m.m_num and cr_num=#{crNum}) cmm where 1=0
or cmm.cm_content like('%${keyword}%')
or cmm.m_name like('%${keyword}%')
order by cmm.cm_write_date asc)) where rnum between #{firstRow} and #{endRow}

select count(*) from ( select * from ( select rownum as rnum,m_name,cm_num,cr_num,m_num,cm_content,cm_write_date,cm_type from ( select * from (select cm.cm_num,m.m_name,cm.cr_num,cm.m_num,cm.cm_content,cm.cm_write_date,cm.cm_type from chat_message cm, member m where cm.m_num=m.m_num and cr_num=#{crNum}) cmm where 1=0
or cmm.cm_content like('%${keyword}%')
or cmm.m_name like('%${keyword}%')
order by cmm.cm_write_date asc)) where rnum between #{firstRow} and #{endRow})

select cm.cm_num ,cm.cr_num,cm.m_num,cm.cm_content,cm.cm_write_date,m.m_name,cm.cm_type,m.m_profileimg,f.f_num from chat_message cm, member m, favorite f where cm.m_num=m.m_num and cm.cr_num=#{param1} and cm.cm_num = f.cm_num and f.m_num=#{param2} order by cm.cm_write_date asc
